app_descript:
British Gas Mobile App

Brief:

The British Gas app serves as a comprehensive companion for all your British Gas services. Whether you're facing a plumbing issue, want to manage your energy usage, or simply need to talk to an advisor, this app has got you covered. It's designed to put convenience and control right at your fingertips, allowing you to handle your household utilities with ease.
